content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 34, "index": 13}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 4, "index": 23}, {"type": "tropical_fish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 64, "index": 30}, {"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 2, "index": 36}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 30, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft red_sandstone, I need to place 4 red_sand in the crafting grid. I will first place one red_sand from slot 23 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 34, "index": 13}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 3, "index": 23}, {"type": "tropical_fish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 64, "index": 30}, {"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 2, "index": 36}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 30, "index": 39}]
thought: I will now place another red_sand from slot 23 into slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 34, "index": 13}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 2, "index": 23}, {"type": "tropical_fish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 64, "index": 30}, {"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 2, "index": 36}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 30, "index": 39}]
thought: I will now place another red_sand from slot 23 into slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 34, "index": 13}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "tropical_fish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 64, "index": 30}, {"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 2, "index": 36}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 30, "index": 39}]
thought: Finally, I will place the last red_sand from slot 23 into slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "red_sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 34, "index": 13}, {"type": "tropical_fish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 64, "index": 30}, {"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 2, "index": 36}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 30, "index": 39}]
thought: Now that I have placed all 4 red_sand in the crafting grid, I can craft the red_sandstone. I will move it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
